text: "Addicted to Love" is a 1986 song by English rock singer Robert Palmer and is the third single from his 8th studio album Riptide. It went to number 1 in the United States and Australia, number 2 in New Zealand, number 4 in Canada, Ireland and South Africa, number 5 in the United Kingdom and number 34 in Belgium and the Netherlands. It was covered live by Tina Turner for her 1988 album Tina Live in Europe. ==Track listing== ==References== Category:1986 songs Category:Robert Palmer songs Category:Tina Turner songs
title: Addicted to Love (song)
